Getting Started¶

Add Feyre to your server¶

You can add Feyre to your server by clicking here. You will need the Manage Server permission in order to do so.

Optional: Change the default prefix¶

By default Feyre using the ! prefix. This may overlap with other bots on your server. If you need to change the default prefix see Optional: Change the default prefix.

Feyre is now ready to go! Head over to the Commands section to explore what Feyre is capable of.
